name: Antmagedhon
description:
Made for Game Off 2021 Gamejam.

Antmagedhon made by Arska & Jurppa

Antmagedhon has arrived..

Its year 2577 - earth has changed. After nuclear war only the most noble creatures have survived... 

Bugs have inherited the world.

There is fierce competition for the throne of the new great world between different bug species.

YOU The Prince Elmer Von Divinas Antmus 134th have decided to rise your colony to new glory.

All obstacles must be razed, enemies submitted, new kingdom built.

Mercy will not be asked and wont be given! Alea icta est!

HOW TO PLAY

WASD Move

Left Click = Shoot
